description: Assesses if a loan should be on nonaccrual status, or can be returned to accrual, based on detailed Comptroller's Handbook guidelines.

parameters.name: guideline_nonaccrual_general_rule
parameters.description: The general rule for placing an asset on nonaccrual status.
parameters.defaultValue: Do not accrue if: maintained on cash basis due to deterioration, OR payment in full of P&I not expected, OR P&I default for 90+ days UNLESS well secured AND in process of collection.

parameters.name: guideline_nonaccrual_well_secured_definition
parameters.description: Definition of 'well secured' for nonaccrual exception.
parameters.defaultValue: Secured by collateral with realizable value sufficient to discharge debt (incl. accrued interest) in full, OR by guarantee of a financially responsible party.

parameters.name: guideline_nonaccrual_in_process_of_collection_definition
parameters.description: Definition of 'in process of collection' for nonaccrual exception.
parameters.defaultValue: Collection proceeding in due course via legal action OR other collection efforts reasonably expected to result in repayment or restoration to current status soon.

parameters.name: guideline_nonaccrual_return_to_accrual_conditions
parameters.description: Conditions for returning a nonaccrual loan to accrual status.
parameters.defaultValue: None of its P&I is due and unpaid AND bank expects repayment of remaining contractual P&I, OR it otherwise becomes well secured AND is in process of collection.

parameters.name: guideline_interest_capitalization
parameters.defaultValue: Inappropriate for most classified loans (Loss, Doubtful, value-impaired, or nonaccrual).

parameters.name: days_past_due_int
parameters.description: Number of days principal or interest is continuously past due.

parameters.name: is_well_secured_bool
parameters.description: Is the asset considered well secured per guidelines?

parameters.name: is_in_process_of_collection_bool
parameters.description: Is the asset considered in the process of collection per guidelines?

parameters.name: expects_full_payment_bool
parameters.description: Does the bank expect payment in full of principal and interest?

parameters.name: is_maintained_on_cash_basis_due_to_deterioration_bool
parameters.description: Is the asset maintained on a cash basis due to borrower's financial deterioration?

parameters.name: repayment_capacity_assessment_str
parameters.description: Overall assessment of repayment capacity (e.g. Strong, Adequate, Weak).

parameters.name: notes_financial_deterioration_str
parameters.description: Notes on any financial deterioration of the borrower.

parameters.name: interest_capitalization_status_str
parameters.description: Current status of interest capitalization (e.g., 'No', 'Yes - Appropriate', 'Yes - Inappropriate').

parameters.name: current_accrual_status_str
parameters.description: The loan's current recorded accrual status (e.g. 'Accrual', 'Nonaccrual').
